title: Nap Time is Over - It's Now Lunch Time
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Nap Time is Over - It's Now Lunch Time
posts.post_content:
For budget conscious collectors who are tired of tackling the monster, this is your lucky day.

Offered today is an admittedly lower grade Lajoie Portrait card.

Surface issues in the left lower quadrant.
Fair centering.
Left cheek white blotch.
A little cursive practice on the reverse
Despite these flaws, it actually presents quite well.
Take a look.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10791/lajoie-portrait[/IMG]

Inquiries welcome. SOLD.

So you might say Lajoie got a s-peck on the cheek, and they tried writing their information on the back.

What a ladies man...

Beautiful card Frank. Great eye appeal! Good luck with the sale.
